name: EverydayPositivityFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A positive flash briefing Alexa skill to help lift your day and put you in the right state of mind to thrive. You got this :) Get your flash briefing motivation today! 

After you enable this Alexa skill, just say "Alexa, play my flash briefing" to start listing. This flash briefing is updated every day and will work on all Alexa Echo devices, Alexa enabled Kindle Fires and even on the go if you download the Alexa app on your mobile phone or tablet.

Hosted by Kate Cocker.

This flash briefing Alexa skill works great on:
 Alexa Echo App
 Alexa app for Kindle Fire
 Amazon Echo Show (all)
 Amazon Echo Spot
 Amazon Echo (all) 
 Amazon Echo Dot (all)
 Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (all)
 Amazon Fire Tablets (all)
 
FEEDBACK
Find us online at http://www.YourEverydayPositivity.com/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
